price: 41. Nakati ya lifelo bakozala na bambeto na bulangiti na bango, mpe bakozipamaka na molili. Mpe ndenge wana nde tokofutaka babubi.
arabic: لَهُم مِّن جَهَنَّمَ مِهَادٞ وَمِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ غَوَاشٖۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
